row.process:
:DEFINE &T_MYHOST#, string, 100 :DEFINE &T_MYIP#, string, 100 :FILL &T_MYIP#[] = STR_SPLIT(&LISTE_IP#," ") :FILL &T_MYHOST#[] = STR_SPLIT(&LISTE_HOSTNAME#," ") :SET &RUNVAR# = 1 :SET &MY_RC#="OK" :WHILE &RUNVAR# LE &NUMBER_CLIENT# : PRINT "Line &RUNVAR#: &T_MYHOST#[&RUNVAR#]" : IF &T_MYHOST#[&RUNVAR#] = &GLOBAL_HOSTNAME# : PSET &GLOBAL_IP# = &T_MYIP#[&RUNVAR#] : ENDIF :SET &RUNVAR# = &RUNVAR# + 1 :ENDWHILE :SET &MY_USER#=GET_VAR(VARA.TECHNICAL.NETDNS,USER) :SET &MY_PASSWORD#=GET_VAR(VARA.TECHNICAL.NETDNS,PASSWORD) :SET &MY_QIPSERVER#=GET_VAR(VARA.TECHNICAL.NETDNS,NETDNSSERVER) :DEFINE &MY_RC#,string
:DEFINE &MY_RC#,string :BEGIN_EXT_INT POWERSHELL write-host "* * * * * * * * * *" get-executionpolicy write-host "* * * * * * * * * *" write-host "netdns &GLOBAL_IP#" if ($?) { :REGISTER_VARIABLE "MY_RC#","OK" } write-host "* * * * * * * * * *" :END_EXT_INT POWERSHELL

row.post_process: :IF &MY_RC# = "KO" : PRINT KO: NETDNS GET IP &GLOBAL_IP# pour &GLOBAL_HOSTNAME# : PRINT DEBUG &EXIT_KISS_KO# : PSET &EXIT_KISS_KO#="&EXIT_KISS_KO#,NETDNS &GLOBAL_IP# pour &GLOBAL_HOSTNAME#" : MODIFY_STATE STATUS_TEXT="NETDNS KO" : MODIFY_STATE RETCODE=10 :ELSE : PRINT OK: NETDNS &GLOBAL_IP# pour &GLOBAL_HOSTNAME# : PSET &EXIT_KISS_OK#="&EXIT_KISS_OK#,NETDNS &GLOBAL_IP# pour &GLOBAL_HOSTNAME#" :ENDIF
